stories.title: Automated Deployment Testing
stories.description: Added automated checks to verify the app deploys correctly, catching issues before they reach your team in the field.

stories.title: Public Landing Page
stories.description: New volunteers can now see what FireShift is about before logging in, while the admin dashboard stays protected for team leads.

stories.title: Accurate Volunteer Counts
stories.description: Fixed an issue where volunteer counts could display incorrectly. Your dashboard now shows the real numbers.

stories.title: PDF Reports Working
stories.description: Generate and download shift reports as PDFs for offline reference or printing before heading to the playa.

stories.title: Progressive Web App Support
stories.description: FireShift can now be installed as an app on any device with a browser, no app store required.

stories.title: Improved Stability
stories.description: Resolved compatibility issues that could cause crashes on some devices. The app runs smoother now.
